        public java.lang.Object[] getParameterValues()
        Description copied from interface: com.guidewire.pl.system.filters.ParameterizedFilter
        Return the parameter values to be substituted into the display string. The parameter at index 0 will be substited for {0}, and so on. Should never return null.
